comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: I checked the prices of Netflix for 2022 and found out that this service is the cheapest in Turkey and for the Premium UHD account it is only $4 per month. How someone can offer the same service for only $2 a month is not at all clear to me, although according to what is written in the account description, these accounts were not legally acquired.QuoteCan last for months if you don't change email or password. The account won't stop working if you don't change credentials (email, password).

comments.author: pitbulll83
comments.body: Bought Spotify Premium 6 months,worked only a month,it was turkey account,probably free trial month,so for me this is scam.No response when I try to contact via telegram or via ticket on site. So be carefulldont buy anything +1 month i guess
